data.name: plSendTo.Help
data.value: Enter the email address of the recipient of the feedback. You may enter more than one recipient by separating the email addresses with semicolons.

data.name: plWidth.Help
data.value: Acceptable values can be in pixels or percentage. If using percentage, enter "%" at the end, while for others simply enter numeric value without units such as "px"

data.name: plRows.Help
data.value: Enter the number of rows to display for the message editor.

data.name: valWidth.ErrorMessage
data.value: Width can be defined either in percentage or pixel format. The value entered is invalid.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The Feedback Settings

The Feedback Module offers authorized site users the ability to direct a message to a defined email location.  There are multiple Feedback Settings that control the display and action performed within the module.   

Send To – this is the email address where the information is sent. The email must be in a valid email format.   

Width – set the number of pixels across the defined module area for the body of the message text.  Note: be careful to keep this to value within the defined width of the panel where the module is placed, otherwise there may not be enough room to actually use the desired setting.  

Rows – set the number of rows of text available for the body of the message text. Note: Again, be careful to keep this value within the defined height of the panel where the module is placed, otherwise there may not be enough room to actually use the desired setting.

Send Copy – Enabling this option allows a copy of the feedback submitted to be sent to the sender's email address. 

Optout - This option allows the sender to choose whether to receive a copy of the feedback submitted. If this option is not available to the user and the Send Copy option is checked, the user will always receive a copy of the feedback submitted.

Category - Select a category to which this feedback should be grouped within. Categories are created via the Feedback Lists

Category List Visible - Determines whether the categories to choose from are visible to the user who is filling the form.

Use Category Values as Send To - If the category value contains a valid email address, it is used as the email address of the recipient of this message,. otherwise the value of "Send to" will be used.

Subject - The subject for this feedback - this is also sent as the subject in the email that is sent out.

Subject List Visible - User is presented with a list of subjects to choose from. (Note that Subject lists can be created via the Feedback Lists page similar to Feedback Categories)

Can Edit Subject - User is presented with a text box for the subject field and can make changes to the values in this field.

Subject Field Hidden - The administrator can setup a Subject via the Subject List and select this option to disable the user from changing the values.

Moderated - Determines whether the feedback submitted needs to be approved prior to making it visible on the website.

Send Email Asynchronously  - if this option is selected, the email that is generated is sent on a separate thread and the user gets control of the page immediately upon clicking on the submit button. 

Use Captcha  - enabling this option prevents Spam BOTS from hijacking your Feedback Form.

data.name: plOptout.Help
data.value: If checked, the sender has the option of choosing whether to receive a copy of the feedback submitted. If this option is unchecked but Send Copy is checked then sender will receive a copy of the feedback submitted.

data.name: plModerationCategory.Help
data.value: If you want to moderate only specific categories, select one or more categories here, otherwise all categories will be moderated.

data.name: plCategory.Help
data.value:
Select the category this message belongs to
(categories are created via the Feedback Lists)

data.name: plCategorySelectable.Help
data.value: Can the sender choose a category from a drop-down list.

data.name: plSubject.Help
data.value:
The subject for this feedback
(subjects are created via the Feedback Lists)

data.name: plSubjectEditField.Help
data.value: User may be presented with a drop-down list or editable textbox for the Subject or the Subject may be hidden from the user. If hidden from the user, a Subject must be entered or selected above.

data.name: plModerated.Help
data.value: If checked, lets the administrator of this module first authorize feedback for displaying in the comment viewer/guestbook

data.name: plAsync.Help
data.value: If this option is selected then the site sends the email asynchronously

data.name: plSendCopy.Help
data.value: Would you like to send a copy of the feedback to the user

data.name: valSendTo.ErrorMessage
data.value: Send To mail must be valid format. Separate multiple recipient emails by semicolons.

data.name: valSendFrom.ErrorMessage
data.value: Send From email must be valid format

data.name: plUseCategoryAsEmail.Help
data.value: If the category value contains a valid email address (multiple email addresses may be seperated by semi-colon), it is used as the email address of the recipient of this message, otherwise the value of "Send to" will be used.

data.name: plUseCategoryAsEmail.Text
data.value: Use Category Value as Send To

data.name: plModerationRoles.Help
data.value: Select the roles which will be allowed to moderate feedback posts

data.name: plListRoles.Help
data.value: Select the roles which will be allowed to add/edit Feedback Lists

data.name: plSendFrom.Help
data.value: If you enter a value here, this is used as the default From email address instead of whatever the user enters on the form. This is useful when Spam filters are blocking emails.

data.name: plCityField.Help
data.value: Indicate if City field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plCountryField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Country field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plNameField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Name field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plPostalCodeField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Postal Code field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plRegionField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Region or State field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plStreetField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Street field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plTelephoneField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Telephone field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plUnmoderatedStatus.Help
data.value: When not all categories are moderated, you may select the status (Archived, Pending, Private, Published, or Deleted) to apply to unmoderated posts.

data.name: plPostalCodeRegex.Help
data.value: Enter a .NET regular expression to validate postal codes. Leave the expression blank to disable postal code validation.

data.name: plTelephoneRegex.Help
data.value: Enter a .NET regular expression to validate telephone numbers. Leave the expression blank to disable telephone number validation.

data.name: plCaptchaVisibility.Help
data.value: Determines when a captcha control (image challenge-response test) to help prevent non-human submissions will be displayed to the user.

data.name: plRedirectTabOnSubmission.Help
data.value: Selects a page on the site to which the user is automatically redirected following submission of the feedback.

data.name: plRepeatSubmissionFilter.Help
data.value: Sets the type of filtering used to limit repeat submissions by the same user. Note: Do not filter by DotNetNuke UserID if anonymous users will be allowed to submit feedback. Filtering by User IP Address may block legitimate uses behind proxy or firewall sharing same IP.

data.name: plMinSubmissionInteval.Help
data.value: When a Repeat Submission Filter is enabled, sets the time (in minutes) the same user must wait before submitting additional feedback.

data.name: valMinSubmissionInteval.ErrorMessage
data.value: Minimum Submission Inteval must be valid integer 0-99999

data.name: plSendToRoles.Help
data.value: Select the user security roles whose users are to be recipients of the feedback.

data.name: plPrintTemplate.Help
data.value: Designs an html template used from printing a single feedback item from the moderation/management control. You may use the same field value tokens as those available in the guest book settings. For example, the token [Feedback:Subject] will be replaced with the feedback Subject field value.

data.name: plPrintAction.Help
data.value: Selects whether the print command displays the results in-line (i.e. on the same page) or as a popup.

data.name: plEmailRegex.Help
data.value: Enter a .NET regular expression to validate email addresses. The email validation regex defined in User Settings/Host Settings is used as the default.

data.name: valEmailRegex.ErrorMessage
data.value: Email validation expression (.Net regular expression) is required.

data.name: plScope.Help
data.value: Selects whether feedback moderators are able to view and manage feedback associated with this instance of the Feedback module only or across all instances of the Feedback module on this portal. Portal scope (which is the legacy behavior prior to this version) should be used with caution.

data.name: Portal.Text
data.value: Portal (across all Feedback modules of portal)

data.name: plOrphanedData.Help
data.value: Earlier versions of the Feedback Module did not store feedback items by module instance thus aggregating all feedback items across an entire portal. When a module instance was deleted, its data remained visible on the Feedback Moderation/Management page and in the comments viewer/guestbook. It could not be deleted, leaving it "orphaned". You may delete such orphaned feedback data associated with deleted modules by clicking the button.

data.name: DeleteOrphanedDataConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all orphaned feedback items associated with deleted Feedback modules?

data.name: plLabelDisplay.Help
data.value: Select how the label for each form field should be displayed. "Above Field" works best when placing the Feedback form in a narrow column.

data.name: valEmptyCategoryListMsg.ErrorMessage
data.value: You must setup a category list if you allow the user to select a category or use the category value as a send to address

data.name: valEmptyCategoryMsg.ErrorMessage
data.value: If you use the category value as a send to address you must either allow the user to select a category or you must select a category in the Feedback module settings

data.name: plCaptchaAudio.Help
data.value: Turns on the ability for users to request audio playback of the Captcha using the phonetic alphabet

data.name: plCaptchaCase.Help
data.value: When enabled the captcha control will ignore the case of the displayed letters when the response is compared

data.name: plCaptchaLineNoise.Help
data.value: Sets the level of line noise in the captcha image

data.name: plCaptchaBackgroundNoise.Help
data.value: Sets the level of background noise in the captcha image

data.name: plEmailField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Email field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plModerationAdminEmails.Help
data.value: If checked, administrators will receive moderation emails as specified in the permissions grid. Unchecking this will stop admins receiving moderation emails.

data.name: plMessageField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Message field is required, optional, or hidden

data.name: plCategoryReq.Help
data.value: Indicate if Category field is required

data.name: plEmailConfirmField.Help
data.value: Indicate if Email confirmation field is required or hidden

data.name: plDuplicateSubmission.Help
data.value: When ticked, duplicate messages cannot be submitted by the same email address.

data.name: plCleanupDaysBefore.Help
data.value: Feedback entries older than current date minus Days Before will be deleted

data.name: plCleanupMaxEntries.Help
data.value: Keep upto Max Entries number of Feedback for each of Pending, Private, Published, Archived.

data.name: plCleanupPending.Help
data.value: Cleanup Feedback that is Pending Moderation

data.name: valCleanupDaysBefore.ErrorMessage
data.value: Days Before must be a valid integer

data.name: valCleanupMaxEntries.ErrorMessage
data.value: Max Entries must be a valid integer

data.name: plAkismetEnable.Help
data.value: Enable Akismet spam checking - http://akismet.com. You must have an api key from Akismet.com for this to function.

data.name: plAkismetKey.Help
data.value: Enter your Akismet api key. Purchase from http://akismet.com.

data.name: plAkismetSendModerator.Help
data.value: When checked, spam items will be sent to the users configured as moderators even if moderation is not enabled.

data.name: plMaxMessage.Help
data.value: Sets the maximum length of the message that can be entered.

data.name: varMaxMessage.ErrorMessage
data.value: Max Message Length must be a valid integer

data.name: plEmailOnly.Help
data.value: When checked only an email will be sent, the feedback will not be stored in the database

data.name: plSendWhenPublished.Help
data.value: When unticked, emails are sent to the recipient as soon as the feedback is submitted. When ticked, emails are sent for Pending and Spam items when the feedback is Published.

data.name: plModerationPageSize.Help
data.value: Sets the page size for the Moderation/Management view
